title: 52 Gifts That College Students Will Actually Appreciate
description: Because you can do so much better than a bed in a bag.
excerpt: Bed sheets and office supplies are essential, but there are a slew of other gifts that undergrads could really use. Ahead, 52 gift ideas for college students.
text: Mansur Gavriel KeyringMansur Gavriel’s leather charm will have them craving a late-night slice. The sauciest of accessories, it can be attached to their keys or their bag.An Apple WatchApple Apple Watch Series 10An Apple Watch can serve many purposes, from helping you set fitness goals to establishing a proper sleep schedule. If you’re thinking about gifting one, consider the latest version, which has additional health metrics like sleep apnea notifications, charges faster than ever, and can even sense water depth and temperature during underwater activities. It’s also compatible with Apple’s Fitness+ that connects users with workout videos.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowOver-Ear HeadphonesBose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling HeadphonesFor the gym junkie who doesn’t want anyone to hear them blasting Charli XCX in between reps, enter Bose’s Bluetooth over-the-ear headphones. They should easily connect to your device, have a noise-canceling feature, and offer up to 20 hours of wireless playtime.A Bluetooth TrackerTile MateNever lose precious cargo again thanks to Tile’s Bluetooth tracker, which is great for attaching to keys, backpacks, purses, and water bottles. Unlike Apple's popular AirTags, these are compatible with both iOS and Android devices. Plus, they not only allow you to find misplaced items via your phone when you connect to the Tile app, but they can also help you locate your phone—even when it’s on silent—with a push of a button.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPlants They Can Keep AliveThe Sill Succulent AssortmentThis succulent trio will freshen up anyone’s space. The best part is, the plants require very little water and attention, so they’ll continue to thrive no matter how busy your student gets. Grab ’N Go Lululemon Dual Pouch WristletStudent life can be summarized as “on-the-go.” A functional wristlet like this one is perfect for the essentials. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRecycling Program Trashie Take Back Bag Rainbow 3-PackHave you ever been to a thrift store in a college town? Students love to purge their closets. Gift them bags for this recycling program, and they’ll earn rewards at places like AMC Theaters, Thrive Market, and Levain Bakery while decluttering and helping the planet. Portable Nightstand BedShelfie Bedside Shelf for Bunk Bed & Top BunkThe trouble with lofted dorm beds is it makes reaching the nightstand impossible. This fixes that. Factor 75 delivers pre-cooked, healthy meals right to their doorstep—all they need to do is heat and enjoy! But the water bottle of today is the Stanley, without a shadow of doubt.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Full Mirror Willa Arlo Interiors Farnborough Full Length MirrorFull-length mirrors are a non-negotiable item for anyone in Gen Z. This one provides RFID tracking for extra safety. A Pair of Slides BRONAX Cloud Slides A house slipper or a shoe for running errands? These squishy cloud slides offer the best of both worlds. Heck, you can even wear them as a shower shoe.
html:
Mansur Gavriel Keyring

Mansur Gavriel’s leather charm will have them craving a late-night slice. The sauciest of accessories, it can be attached to their keys or their bag.

An Apple Watch

Apple Apple Watch Series 10

An Apple Watch can serve many purposes, from helping you set fitness goals to establishing a proper sleep schedule. If you’re thinking about gifting one, consider the latest version, which has additional health metrics like sleep apnea notifications, charges faster than ever, and can even sense water depth and temperature during underwater activities. It’s also compatible with Apple’s Fitness+ that connects users with workout videos.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Over-Ear Headphones

Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones

For the gym junkie who doesn’t want anyone to hear them blasting Charli XCX in between reps, enter Bose’s Bluetooth over-the-ear headphones. They should easily connect to your device, have a noise-canceling feature, and offer up to 20 hours of wireless playtime.

A Bluetooth Tracker

Tile Mate

Never lose precious cargo again thanks to Tile’s Bluetooth tracker, which is great for attaching to keys, backpacks, purses, and water bottles. Unlike Apple's popular AirTags, these are compatible with both iOS and Android devices. Plus, they not only allow you to find misplaced items via your phone when you connect to the Tile app, but they can also help you locate your phone—even when it’s on silent—with a push of a button.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Plants They Can Keep Alive

The Sill Succulent Assortment

This succulent trio will freshen up anyone’s space. The best part is, the plants require very little water and attention, so they’ll continue to thrive no matter how busy your student gets.

Grab ’N Go

Lululemon Dual Pouch Wristlet

Student life can be summarized as “on-the-go.” A functional wristlet like this one is perfect for the essentials.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Recycling Program

Trashie Take Back Bag Rainbow 3-Pack

Have you ever been to a thrift store in a college town? Students love to purge their closets. Gift them bags for this recycling program, and they’ll earn rewards at places like AMC Theaters, Thrive Market, and Levain Bakery while decluttering and helping the planet.

Portable Nightstand

BedShelfie Bedside Shelf for Bunk Bed & Top Bunk

The trouble with lofted dorm beds is it makes reaching the nightstand impossible. This fixes that.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Desk Organizer

Martha Stewart Weston Wooden Desktop Organizer

With essays and calculators and receipts, dorm surfaces clutter up so fast.

Trending Phone Accessory

OCTOBUDDY Silicone Suction Phone Case Adhesive Mount

You don’t need to understand it; just know that Octobuddies are all the rage right now.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Hot & Cold Cap

TheraICE Rx Migraine Headache Relief Cap

Two words: Hangover. Cure.

A Kitchen Set

Anyday The College Dorm Bundle

Anyday is answering every college kid’s prayers with its innovative line of dishes specifically meant for microwave cooking. No stove? No problem. Steamed veggies, crispy bacon, and mug cakes coming right up.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Dinner Upgrade

Factor 75 Monthly Meal Subscription

Give them a break from $1 cups of ramen and microwave meals with this major improvement. Factor 75 delivers pre-cooked, healthy meals right to their doorstep—all they need to do is heat and enjoy!

An Insulated Tumbler

Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler

First it was S’well bottles. Then it was HydroFlasks. But the water bottle of today is the Stanley, without a shadow of doubt.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Full Mirror

Willa Arlo Interiors Farnborough Full Length Mirror

Full-length mirrors are a non-negotiable item for anyone in Gen Z. Where else would they take their OOTD pics?

A Go-To Takeout Meal

Uber Eats Gift Card

If there’s one universal truth among college students, it's that dining hall food gets old. Treat your giftee to a restaurant-quality meal on you.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A New Wallet

ROYCE New York RFID Blocking Minimalist Leather Card Case

A sleek card holder is always a good idea—and a safe bet. This one provides RFID tracking for extra safety.

Celsius Assorted Flavors Official Variety Pack

We can’t get enough of Celsius’ functional energy drinks as working adults, so can you even imagine if these existed when we were students?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pottery Barn Fireside Cozy Reversible Throw

After a long day of classes, nothing beats snuggling up with a cozy blanket.

A Pair of Slides

BRONAX Cloud Slides

A house slipper or a shoe for running errands? These squishy cloud slides offer the best of both worlds. Heck, you can even wear them as a shower shoe.
